Html:
Hi,

I am waiting for the next Oxite release to re-launch my blog! We are all waiting :) Are you planning to release anytime soon?

Regards,

Adam

Poke, poke.

I think they are semi-distracted at this point with the PDC site.

 

:)

Your thinking is correct.  SWAMPED  :|

We still have more cleanup to go on Oxite before launching the next version.  That's really what we're down to though...stabalization and cleanup.  No new features from what you see in the dev branch today (other than some UI for things that aren't completed yet).
